actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Klas Dieter Hinze, Heidi Hinze, Annamarie Hinze, and Robert Arndt.

summary.text: Declares that Klaus Dieter Hinze, Heidi Hinze, Annamarie Hinze, and Roberto Arndt shall be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence upon filing the appropriate application.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Klas Dieter Hinze, Heidi Hinze, Annamarie Hinze, and Robert Arndt.
